pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.63: The English translation cannot properly capture the Pali, in which the word for “offense” and “attainment” is the same, _āpatti_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.2.42: I have not translated _kilāsa_, since it simply seems to be a variety of leprosy, _kuṭṭha_, see [](Sp.5.996.12). I am not aware that modern English terminology distinguishes between _kuṭṭha_ and _kilāsa_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.5.2: This looks like an editing mistake. Presumably this should read, “We’re not going to a good destination/we can only expect a bad destination.” And below [](MS.2.96), [](MS.2.104), and [](MS.2.108).
